summary: With trouble at Terra, Celsius and Three Arrows Capital — not the mention the wider market rout — crypto firms have had to make cuts. Here’s a list.
title: Boom turns to bust: a summary of recent crypto layoffs
content: There’s been a sudden change in headwinds for crypto firms over the last two months, with the chaos centered on Celsius Network and Three Arrows Capital spreading among many other companies. This, along with a related, widespread market decline, has thrown many companies’ hiring plans into disarray.

Chief among them are Coinbase, Gemini, BlockFi and BitMEX. All have announced significant cuts in their headcount — reversing initial targets to double or even triple staffing by the end of the year. It’s a big change in momentum.
Despite this, some firms are planning to stay the course and have made clear statements that they intent to keep hiring, albeit perhaps not as aggressively. These include Binance, Kraken and Nexo.
